LanguageData.Frenzy_Work.label: завзята праця
LanguageData.Frenzy_Work.beginLetter: {0} щойно {0_gender ? надихнувся : надихнулась}. [PAWN_pronoun] працюватиме у 2.5 рази швидше протягом наступних 24 годин.
LanguageData.Frenzy_Go.label: енергійність
LanguageData.Frenzy_Go.beginLetter: {0} щойно {0_gender ? надихнувся : надихнулась}. [PAWN_pronoun] ходитиме у 1.5 рази швидше протягом наступних 2 днів.
LanguageData.Frenzy_Shoot.label: соколине око
LanguageData.Frenzy_Shoot.beginLetter: {0} щойно {0_gender ? надихнувся : надихнулась}. Точність [PAWN_possessive] стрільби буде покращеною протягом наступних 3 днів.
LanguageData.Inspired_Trade.label: inspired trade
LanguageData.Inspired_Trade.beginLetter: {0} has just been inspired. [PAWN_pronoun] will get a significant trade price bonus for [PAWN_possessive] next trade deal.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days or when the deal is done.
LanguageData.Inspired_Recruitment.label: inspired recruitment
LanguageData.Inspired_Recruitment.beginLetter: {0} has just been inspired. [PAWN_pronoun] will successfully recruit the next prisoner regardless of difficulty.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days or when the prisoner is recruited.
LanguageData.Inspired_Surgery.label: inspired surgery
LanguageData.Inspired_Surgery.beginLetter: {0} has just been inspired. The surgery failure chance for the next surgery performed by [PAWN_objective] will be 10 times smaller.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days or when the surgery is performed.
LanguageData.Inspired_Creativity.label: inspired creativity
LanguageData.Inspired_Creativity.beginLetter: {0} has just been inspired. Any item crafted or piece of furniture or art completed will be 2 quality levels higher than it would otherwise be.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days or when the item, furniture or art is completed.
